name: Apollo for Reddit - No Extensions
subtitle: Apollo for Reddit unofficial AltStore source without extensions.
description:
This is an unofficial AltStore source for Apollo for Reddit tweaked with ImprovedCustomApi by @JeffreyCA.

This is the NO EXTENSIONS version - Apollo injected with ImprovedCustomApi and removed extensions. Uses fewer App IDs (1 vs 7) - ideal for free Apple Developer accounts.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/Balackburn/Apollo

apps.name: Apollo for Reddit - No Extensions
apps.subtitle: The award-winning Reddit app
apps.localizedDescription:
Apollo is an app for Reddit built for customizability, smoothness, gestures, and taking advantage of everything iOS has to offer. Apollo is a beautiful Reddit app built for fast navigation with an incredibly powerful set of features. Thanks to features like the Jump Bar, fully customizable gestures, and a super-charged Media Viewer, browsing Reddit has never been this amazing. It's created specifically with iOS design guidelines in mind, so it fits right at home on your device, and with input from thousands of Redditors helping sculpt and perfect it over several years before launching:

• Jump Bar, for super-fast hopping between subreddits
• Super-charged Media Viewer for an amazing experience viewing images, GIFs, videos, albums, and more from a variety of sources.
• Tabbed interface for easy navigating
• Incredibly powerful Markdown composer for writing comments and posts
• Full inline Imgur uploading, both images and albums
• Large or compact posts depending on your preference
• Dark mode (can be automatic)
• Fully customizable gestures
• Safari View Controller for browsing articles and links
• Inline previews of media in comments
• 3D Touch support
• Beautifully organized Inbox
• Filtering and blocking
• Face ID / Touch ID / Passcode lock
• Moderator features
• Tons of settings to tweak
• GIF scrubbing to go backward and forward in time
• Multiple accounts
• Powerful search
• Full Markdown rendering
• Unobtrusive Volume Indicator

As well as much, much more and it's constantly evolving. If you have anything you'd specifically like to see, come to the ApolloApp subreddit and we'd love to hear it! Apollo is an unofficial app, and side effects may include an incredible browsing experience.

versions.localizedDescription:
Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.4.3"

Release Notes
• Fix inline Giphy GIFs not loading in comments (99)
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.4.2"

Release Notes
• Update default trending subreddit source to "https://jeffreyca.github.io/subreddits/trending•subriff•blended.txt" ([source](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/subreddits?tab=readme•ov•filetrending•subriff•blendedtxt))
    • Previous source has been discontinued
• Fix certain GIFs playing at 2x speed on 120Hz displays (97)
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.3.2"

Release Notes
• Fix crashes in Custom API settings on iOS 14 (issue: 10, PR: 88)
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.3.0"

Release Notes
• Backup and restore most Apollo and tweak settings (in Settings > General > Custom API) (issue: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/83, PR: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/pull/84)
    • Settings are exported as a .zip file with 2 plist files: "preferences.plist" (most Apollo and tweak settings) and "group.plist" (filters, theme settings)
    • Restoring settings does not restore or affect existing account logins. This means on a clean install, accounts need to be re•added manually. The backup .zip contains an "accounts.txt" with all account usernames for reference.
• Update Custom API Settings layout




Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.2.6"

Release Notes
• Fix video downloads failing on certain v.redd.it videos (issue: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/75, PR: https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/pull/76)
    • Context: recently, Reddit started using [CMAF media format](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/http•live•streaming/about•the•common•media•application•format•with•http•live•streaming•hls) for serving video content, which Apollo does not natively support downloading for.
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.2.5"

Release Notes
• Fix occassional crashes when scrolling on iOS 26 with Liquid Glass patch (thanks @dankrichtofen for the original implementation)
  • To apply Liquid Glass patch: see [instructions](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi?tab=readme•ov•fileios•26•liquid•glass•patch) or [original issue](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/63)
• Fix crashes when tapping share URL link buttons on iOS 26
    • Note that this is not a full fix. Tapping the link button now navigates to a webview on iOS 26. As a workaround, tap the inline text (see [this comment](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/issues/62issuecomment•3247359652)).
• Fix debug logging on iOS 26
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Known Issues

• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed

Apollo version: "v1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "v1.2.3"

Release Notes
• Fix issue with Imgur multi•image uploads consistently failing (51). Note that multi•image uploads still fail on the first attempt but should succeed on the next attempt.
• Update Custom API settings with link to [new GitHub discussion](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo•ImprovedCustomApi/discussions/60) where you can share your own subreddit sources with others.
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo version: "1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi version: "1.2.2"

Release Notes
• Fix video downloads failing on certain v.redd.it videos (25, 55)

Note that the ".deb" file is significantly larger due to some new external dependencies needed to fix the issue (FFmpegKit).
Known Issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser

Apollo for Reddit (with ImprovedCustomApi) Release Information
Apollo .IPA Version: "1.15.11"
ImprovedCustomApi .DEB Version: "1.2.1"

RELEASE "1.15.11"•"1.2.1": (2025/01/04)
• Updated ImprovedCustomApi from "[1.1.8](https://github.com/Balackburn/Apollo/releases/tag/v1.15.11_1.1.8)" to "1.2.1"
  • • Custom random and trending subreddits • you can now specify an external URL to use as the source for random and trending subreddits (in Settings > General > Custom API)\r\n    • Sources should be a plaintext file with one subreddit name per line, without the  prefix (see examples below)\r\n    • Default trending source (data from [gummysearch.com](https://gummysearch.com/tools/top•subreddits/)): https://jeffreyca.github.io/subreddits/trending•gummy•daily.txt\r\n    • Default /r/random source: https://jeffreyca.github.io/subreddits/popular.txt\r\n    • New setting to customize how many trending subreddits to show (requires app restart)\r\n    • New setting to show a dedicated RandNSFW button (requires app restart)\r\n• Minor UI updates to the settings view\r\n• URL optimizations (52) • thanks @ryannair05!

Known issues
• Apollo Ultra features may cause app to crash
• Imgur multi•image upload
• Uploads usually fail on the first attempt but subsequent retries should succeed
• Share URLs in private messages and long•tapping them still open in the in•app browser
